meanings.definition: Coming after the fifth in a series.
meanings.sent1: The sixth book on the shelf was a mystery novel.
meanings.sent2: She was the sixth person in line to buy tickets.
meanings.sent3: The sixth cookie in the jar magically disappeared.
meanings.sent4: His sixth sense told him something was wrong.
meanings.sent5: The sixth star in the sky shone the brightest.

meanings.sent1: She ate a sixth of the pizza all by herself.
meanings.sent2: The cake was divided into sixths for everyone to have a piece.
meanings.sent3: He won a sixth of the prize in the contest.
meanings.sent4: The sixth of the pie was the most delicious.
meanings.sent5: A sixth of the class passed the test with flying colors.

meanings.definition: The sixth forward gear in a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: He shifted into sixth to drive faster on the highway.
meanings.sent2: The car smoothly transitioned into sixth for better speed.
meanings.sent3: In the race, he zoomed past in sixth gear.
meanings.sent4: The engine roared as he pushed the car into sixth.
meanings.sent5: The vehicle purred as it cruised in sixth down the road.
